CustomField.formula: (CASE( Knowledge__c , "A", 5, "B", 4,"C",3, "D",2,"F",1,0) + CASE( Professionalism__c , "A", 5, "B", 4,"C",3, "D",2,"F",1,0) ) / (CASE( Knowledge__c , "A", 5, "B", 5,"C",5, "D",5,"F",5,0) + CASE( Professionalism__c , "A", 5, "B", 5,"C",5, "D",5,"F",5,0) )
CustomField.label: Staff score
